code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{addToCart}from'../Redux/Action';import ItemAddDec from'./ItemAddDec';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductDetails(){var product=useSelector(function(state){return state.shop.products;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var productDetails=product.filter(function(prod){return prod.id===parseInt(id)?product:'';});var _productDetails$=productDetails[0],productName=_productDetails$.name,imgName=_productDetails$.image,price=_productDetails$.price,stock=_productDetails$.stock,productDate=_productDetails$.createDate;var newPrice=price.slice(1,price.length);var nepaliPrice=Number(newPrice)*119;var imgSrc="https://electronic-ecommerce.herokuapp.com/".concat(imgName);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{width:"18rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgSrc,className:"card-img-top",alt:"laptop"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ItemAddDec,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rs: ",nepaliPrice]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Stocks left: ",stock]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Released on: ",new Date(productDate).toString().slice(0,15)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary addBtn",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(addToCart(product));},children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});}export default ProductDetails;
